name: Dog Translator, Games for Dogs
description:
This is a simulation game application that aims to bring fun and closeness to your dog
Dog Translator is the most intuitive way to interact with your Dog!

Have you ever dream about talking to your puppy? Now it’s possible. Our Dog Translator App will help you to understand the emotions of your beloved pet.

Terms of use: https://dtstudiovn.blogspot.com/2021/12/terms-of-use.html
